content.question:
The following table shows the probability distribution for the prize amounts that will be awarded at a school raffle.
Prize $1 $5 $10 $20 $50 Probability 0.60 0.30 0.05 0.04 0.01 
Let the random variable <math alttext="P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>P</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> represent a randomly selected prize amount. What is the expected value of <math alttext="P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>P</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>Â ?

unit.text: 4: Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions

topic.text: 4.8: Mean and Standard Deviation of Random Variables

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Determine parameters for probability distributions.
